data.eml:eml: Review of the genus Pseudoxistrella Liang, 1991 (Orthoptera: Tetrigidae, Metrodorinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Yu, Sergey, Omelko, Mikhail M. (2012): Review of the genus Pseudoxistrella Liang, 1991 (Orthoptera: Tetrigidae, Metrodorinae). Zootaxa 3573: 59-65, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.210291
